Name: BM Studio
About the game: Feel yourself a composer! In BM Studio you can compose your unique melody! Features Assign to the buttons sounds from the list Using the scrollbar, change the tone of the sound Using the keyboard as a launcher, play your melody! Show yourself! You have a unique opportunity to add sounds yourself! Find the folder Audio in the project directory. Drag and drop your sound into the Audio folder Your sound is displayed in the application list
